The answer is C: Event 0 – The narrator introducing Tori’s transition into motherhood and that Jackson was born with a type of dwarfism like his father (audio), while Tori is shown on camera and with a teacher-themed ornament (visual).

This event sets the foundation for the following events as it establishes the context of Tori's unique situation as a new mother. It also provides the audience with an understanding of the challenges she may face, which becomes relevant when discussing her decision to share milestone photos on social media.

The events that most likely fueled the wave of supportive responses were A: Event 4 – Tori’s July 2017 longer, candid post about breastfeeding being the hardest part of motherhood and calling out stigma (audio), shown while she is repeatedly pictured holding Jackson in intimate settings (visual) and C: Event 6 – The reference to Amanda Seyfried’s remarks praising all feeding choices and the note that Tori wanted a question answered (audio), alongside close-ups of Jackson and family-in-the-pool imagery that mirror social sharing (visual). These events likely brought attention to Tori's struggles as a new mother and her openness about them, which resonated with many viewers who could relate to her experiences.
